Posts.Content: CrystalLocket wrote: I'm just past my second treatment and my hair is all gone.  I have been wearing caps and wigs pretty much 24/7 but they are so darned hot!  I now know why hair is so important, it wicks away moisture.  Any suggestions besides going bald?  Is there any kind of wig or hat that will keep my head cool? Karen Dx 11/24/2008, ILC, 1cm, Stage IIA, Grade 2, 1/11 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hair's all gone and I'm HOT! CrystalLocket apple

Posts.Title: Swollen feet and ankles? CrystalLocket lexislove

Posts.Content: CrystalLocket wrote: and has no suction.  My right breast is also very purply pink (the breast with the lymph nodes removed, the left breast, simple mast, is fine).  I have a call into the PS office and am waiting for a call back.  Is this something I should be worried about?  Should I be heading to the emergency room?  Otherwise I feel fine. I will come back with the PS's answer in case someon eelse has the same problem down the line, but I'm looking for thoughts in the meantime. Karen Dx 11/24/2008, ILC, 1cm, Stage IIA, Grade 2, 1/11 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
